bartap.title: BarTap
bartap.desc: Bar Tap is a virtual bar game. Challenge your friends and see who will pay the next round! Perfect to organize events and a friendly esport competition.

progeny.title: Progeny
progeny.desc: Insure the survival of 6 different species by making them evolve as they travel the galaxy in search of a new home.

hypnoquest2.title: HypnoQuest 2
hypnoquest2.desc: In this sequel to EQ1, explore the pathology of the mind through 10 levels. Each one is insane & difficult. Unlock new levels by earning good grades.

hypnoquest.title: HypnoQuest
hypnoquest.desc: An intensive arcade game where the entire screen & effects are your opponent. A game of EQ is fast paced and will test all of your best reflexes.

uith.title: Up in the Heavens
uith.desc: An arcade game using the phone&tablet's gyroscope feature. The player must avoid obstacles on a semi-invisible highway.

songlords.title: Song Lords
songlords.desc: Fight with your friends online with music. Both you & your opponent will choose a song and play a dynamic sequence that is generated by music.

vikingraid.title: Viking Raid
vikingraid.desc: Discover Paris as a pillaging Viking in this fun family oriented app! The player will learn of the Vikings in Europe and obtain great bargains in shops and museums.

forms.title: Forms
forms.desc: Use your brain and reflexes in this increasingly difficult arcade game. Find the order of angles to click, and get coins to gather more time.

ysnp.title: You Shall Not Path
ysnp.desc: The Maze of YSNP awaits. Its randomly generated rooms will hold hours of delight and challenge. The speed of the screen increases as you play.

fishest.title: The Fishest !
fishest.desc: Play a fish stuck in the Mariana Trench. Eat smaller fish, avoid larger ones, and battle the 7 bosses of the sea. Survive the depths!

mmup.title: Match Me Up
mmup.desc: A new way to approach dating apps. MMup is a local & Hot seat initiative. Challenge the object of your desire to a challenge for their number.

breakup.title: #BreakUp
breakup.desc: A classy way to let your other half that it's over. Answer 10 questions that will redefine your relationship, and share that status with him/her.
